name: San Francisco Cocaine Anonymous
description: Cocaine Anonymous is a fellowship of men and women in San Francisco who share their experience, strength, and hope with each other so that they may solve their common problem of cocaine use and help others to recover from their addiction.
fullDescription: Cocaine Anonymous is a fellowship of men and women in San Francisco who share their experience, strength, and hope with each other so that they may solve their common problem of cocaine use and help others to recover from their addiction.
